name: Stuffing, Gravy And Marinades
ingredients: 1 Short loaf of Pepperidge Farm White Sandwich Bread
1 pound Jones Sausage in a roll
instructions: GRAM BOWMAN’S TURKEY DRESSING INVENTED BY HER HUSBAND MATTY BOWMAN
This is to be made on Wednesday before Thanksgiving.
On Tuesday Morning put the bread out to dry on a cookie sheet
On Wednesday  put into a large pan crumble dried bread and shredded wheat
Boil gizzards, heart, liver, neck in sauce pan covered w/ water, salt to taste for 30 minutes
Add pound calves liver to the pot and boil for another 30 minutes.
Dice celery, grind 2 medium yellow onions, grind walnuts handful (3/4 cup) add everything to bread mixture.  Fry sausage loosely *not brown
Grind liver, gizzards, heart and neck (take meat off of neck and discard neck) and add to bread mixture
Wet bread with juice from pan.
Just before stuffing turkey, add bell’s poultry dressing (always use fresh box)
Bake turkey according to Betty Crocker.
